name: Changeover: Decisions
description: Your character has lost his memory and finds himself in a godforsaken place. An adventure with a nonlinear storyline, lots of choices, and a unique combat system. Could he get out alive?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (x64) Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB VRAM Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 (x64) Processor: 2.5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB VRAM Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
